metadata.title: CVE-2014-8990 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: default-rsyncssh.lua in Lsyncd 2.1.5 and earlier allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a filename.

criterions.comment: lsyncd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
